abstract: Over two dozen students attending University of California, Davis, live in the Domes, igloolike fiberglass huts that were created in 1972 as an experiment in communal housing; residents in community of 14 domes practice sustainable living and meet weekly to decide issues by consensus.
lead_paragraph: A 1970s experiment in communal housing at the University of California, Davis, continues to draw students with its sustainable, grow-your-own ethos.
snippet: A 1970s experiment in communal housing at the University of California, Davis, continues to draw students with its sustainable, grow-your-own ethos.

headline.main: A Counterculture Spirit Flourishes, Preserved Under Fiberglass Domes
headline.print_headline: A Counterculture Spirit Flourishes, Preserved Under Fiberglass Domes
